Class District

java.lang.Object
District
public class District
extends java.lang.Object
This is an abstract representation of a District with composition of Incidents stored in an arraylist. Constructor defines the new arraylist and a name for the district.

    • averageIncidentValue

      public double averageIncidentValue​(int year)
      This method finds the average incident value recorded in the district in a given year.
      Parameters:
      year - is the year a user inputs.
      Returns:
      the average double value; If average is not a number (does not exist) returns 0

    • incidentsWithGreaterValue

      public java.util.List<Incident> incidentsWithGreaterValue​(double value)
      This method creates a list of all incidents recorded in the district with a value greater than a given amount of money.
      Parameters:
      value - is double value user inputs that incidents have tobe greater than.
      Returns:
      an arraylist of incidents which meet the condition
